Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2016...
Injured on 4/23/2016 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 7-8 weeks...
Injured on 7/7/2017 with a Broken Foot, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2018, off Benjamin Berg (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2018, off Jason Billie (COL)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2018, hitting .336 with 8 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2018, hitting .271 with 37 HR, 112 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 5/26/2019...
Injured on 9/4/2019 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 7/28/2020...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 7/30/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2020, hitting .423 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,300,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2021...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,300,000 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 9/7/2022...
Injured on 9/30/2022 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,300,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Traded from Cincinnati to Houston on 7/25/2023 (Going to HOU: CF David Martin, P George Telles, 3B Seve Guadalupe. Going to CIN: P Dwight Harwell, 3B Justin Tepper, P James Albers)...
Injured on 8/18/2023 with a Sore Back, out for 2 weeks...
9/16/2023: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $17,500,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2024, hitting .450 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2024, hitting .474 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2024, hitting .281 with 9 HR, 22 RBI...
Was selected to the 2026 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2026, hitting .337 with 8 HR, 18 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/8/2027 to a 4-year deal worth $18,000,000 per year...
